content: discover a cozy and stylish winter accessory with these crochet earmuffs working in rounds in velvety bernat blanket brights you ll do chain single_crochet single_crochet 2 together slip_stitch and more the clever design worked over a headband for stability ensures a comfortable fit that s as practical as it is fashionable charming crochet hearts provide both warmth and a unique touch to your winter ensemble materials bernat® blanket brights™ 10 5 oz/300 g 220 yds/201 m bright pink 12042 1 ball or 55 yds/50 m measurements heart motif = approx 5½ 14 cm wide after assembly
